- virtual machine
- create from [[Amazon Machine Image (AMI)]]

#### user data
- script that executed when the instance is started

#### key name
- key name for a `aws_key_pair` for setting up ssh access

```terraform
resource "aws_key_pair" "deployer" {
  key_name   = "deployer-key"
  public_key = "ssh-rsa  email@example.com"
}
```

### volume
- each [[ESC]] instance has an associated root device volume, which is either an 
	- Amazon EBS volume 
	- instance store volume
